comment._content: The Wiard rifle is a semi-steel light artillery piece invented by Norman Wiard. About 60 were manufactured between 1861 and 1862, at O'Donnell's Foundry, New York City: "although apparently excellent weapons, [they] do not seem to have been very popular".
